story.text: While reviewing, the observer also considers the "strategic" direction of the work, coming up with ideas for improvements and likely future problems to address. This is intended to free the driver to focus all of their attention on the "tactical" aspects of completing the current task, using the observer as a safety net and guide - [pWikipediaURL wikipedia]
reviews - [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Pair_programming_1.jpg wikimedia]
